characters.name: How many flagellomeres are on the antenna?
Are wings present on female specimens?
Is the female foretarsus modified into a pincer-like claw?

states: more than twice its width from the clypeus
less than its width from the clypeus
characters.name: How far is the antennal insertion from the clypeus?

states: no, the insertion is on a flat or concave surface below the middle of head
characters.name: Is the antenna inserted on a low conical protuberance above the middle of the head?
How many cells are enclosed by tubular veins in the hind wing?

states: the pronotum is without anterior flange, thus exposing propleura in dorsal view
the pronotum is with anterior flange, concealing propleura in dorsal view
characters.name: What is the shape of the pronotum?

states: yes, numerous conspicuous hairs, longer than half the width of the flagellomere
only inconspicuous recumbent hairs, less than half as long as the width of the flagellomere
characters.name: Are long hairs present on male flagellomeres?

states: no, the prosternum is small and transverse
characters.name: Is the shape the prosternum large and diamond shaped (exposed in ventral view)?
How many exposed terga are on the metasoma?
Was the specimen collected in Brazil, South Africa, Australia or Madagascar?
